results.content: I took this course because I needed to connect an Laravel app with an Angular app, and this course is just about that, maybe the course could be more complete explaining for example how to create the AuthService and AuthGuard, and how to protect specific endpoints
results.content_html: I took this course because I needed to connect an Laravel app with an Angular app, and this course is just about that, maybe the course could be more complete explaining for example how to create the AuthService and AuthGuard, and how to protect specific endpoints

results.content: Almost perfect, but in the beginning you don’t explain the creation of the database, you only connect to it.
results.content_html: Almost perfect, but in the beginning you don’t explain the creation of the database, you only connect to it.

results.content: Good experience with Antonio, as instructor, and about the course is very good to cover the arguments described. It's missing server deployment and the guards (routes protection) to be the Best course.
results.content_html: Good experience with Antonio, as instructor, and about the course is very good to cover the arguments described. It's missing server deployment and the guards (routes protection) to be the Best course.
